Description: Rim sherd of Chian Mature Animal Stylee pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; part of lotus flower in added white outline with added red centres; exterior: vertical strokes around rim above maeander band between pairs of lines; below, part of pendant triangle and rosette as filling ornament.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 260, no.509)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0487) (phase 2)
